Html:
I edited trinket 45703 to give it "Equipment Effects" "Spells Mana Cost Reduction" entered value of 42.

The value sticks on the Editor screen. However when I click OK and go back to the character profile the tooltip does not update and show the added trinket bonus.

Thanks
Doctus

Is on my todo list.

Edit; You can try to figure out how many spells you cast every second. Like if you cast 0,5 spells per second, that trinket saves you 42*0,5 = 21 mana/second, or 105mp5. Many talents reduce the cost of spells, so if you cast a lot of cost reduced spells, this value is lower I'd guess most Priests will get somewhere between 100-80mp5 reduction in spell cost usage with this trinket.
